title: padasEvanam nirantara saubhAgyam
sahitya:
padasEvanam nirantara saubhAgyam Eva dEhi pAhi gOpAla svAmi tava pada


anupallavi

  adasI su-manasA parivAdita Ayata nayana manOratha vadana niduvanarasa paripUrita mandAkini 
lIlA vilAsakara yadukula kumuda hita sumukha vadhUjanA pAnga subhAnga mangaLa karatava


caraNam    vadana kumuda nirgata muraLI manOhara vadanA kutUka nAda rasAraNavOd 
bhuta kumuda bAndhava suvadhunA madhura bhAvarapasAdbhuta shrI dIpara rAga AlApanA gOpa
				(madhyamakAlam)
vaddhUjana manOrathAnandA-nupamAnubhava rasamaya maNI bhUSaNa 
mandahAsa sundarAnga surucira mahAnaka naTavara paTU vESaNa tava
